document_data.name: ''The Twilight Tome''
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20151030080255/https://candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_101112-06.htm| title = So Saith Ed Oct â€“ Dec 2006| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.Description: By the late-15{{th}} century [[DR]], ''The Twilight Tome'' was one of the longest-running and famous publications in Berdusk. The chapbook was filled with satirical poems, witty commentaries, song lyrics, and works of short fiction.
